info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 8:41PM MDT until June 09 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Glasgow affecting Valley County. For the Milk River...including Glasgow...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Glasgow. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Some flooding will also occur on area farmlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 26.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM MDT Tuesday was 28.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 25.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then rise to 26.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will fall below flood stage Thursday morning to 14.1 feet early Monday morning then rise again. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.4 feet on 03/09/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Milk River Glasgow 25.0 26.1 Tue 8 pm MDT 25.9 23.8 19.5 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning by 1000 AM MDT.
